verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump Jr.] [V: responded] [ARG1: to the Senate Judiciary Committee 's Wednesday release of transcripts of closed - door interviews with the attendees of the controversial June 2016 Trump Tower meeting that involved him , top Trump campaign officials , and a Kremlin - connected lawyer , among others] .

Donald Trump Jr. responded to the Senate Judiciary Committee 's Wednesday release of transcripts of closed - door interviews with the attendees of [ARG2: the controversial June 2016 Trump Tower meeting] [R-ARG2: that] [V: involved] [ARG1: him , top Trump campaign officials , and a Kremlin - connected lawyer , among others] .

Donald Trump Jr. responded to the Senate Judiciary Committee 's Wednesday release of transcripts of closed - door interviews with the attendees of the controversial June 2016 Trump Tower meeting that involved him , top Trump campaign officials , and a [ARG2: Kremlin] - [V: connected] [ARG1: lawyer] , among others .
